metadata.name: Basic Miner
metadata.description: A Basic Miner Can mine Genius for 1 to 4,444 days. 20-day Basic Miner is the shortest stake that will have 1 Blackout Day at the beginning and end of the stake’s Promise Period.  Basic Miners of 19 or less Promise Days are an exception and do not have a blackout period. Basic miner commitments cannot be ended early.

attributes.value: “The habit of saving is itself an education; it fosters every virtue, teaches self-denial, cultivates the sense of order, trains to forethought, and so broadens the mind.” - Thornton T. Munger
